msItem.title: Tarikh-i Jahanara. Volume 1.
msItem.note: Folio one, recto: Presented by Col Monteith Dec 4. 1830 This may be the only complete copy recorded by Storey. A history of the reign of Fath 'Ali Shah Qajar to 1233/1817. Headings in red
msItem.incipit: Nahmaduka Allahuma ya man laka al-amr

bindingDesc.p: Same scribe, binding and format as Codrington/Reade No 153, which is the second volume of the work. Has the notice from Morley's printed catalogue for Morley No 155 (which is Codrington/Reade No 153) pasted inside the front cover. The volumes are in the wrong order in Codrington and Codrington/Reade.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org

list.item: History of Iran, Qajar period, reign of Fath 'Ali Shah.
